about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description1: I am passionate about fashion, style and image. I take my own photos with professional camera and produce content designed to enhance clothing pieces with naturalness, light and intention.
about.description2: I like to create images that reflect everyday life with style — with that real, light and spontaneous touch that truly connects with the audience. Besides modeling, I take care of production, photography, editing and delivery of content ready for use. Everything with creative vision, thoughtful aesthetics and an authorial touch.

service1.title: Complete look photoshoots
service1.description: Professional photography with complete styling and art direction.

service2.title: Editing and retouching
service2.description: Professional image treatment with attention to details.

service3.title: Special studio guidelines
service3.description: Creative direction and controlled environment for unique results.

service4.title: High quality photos, ready to publish
service4.description: Optimized images ready for social media and marketing.

service5.title: Online gallery for clients
service5.description: Exclusive and secure access to your photographs.

philosophy.title: MY PHILOSOPHY
philosophy.quote1: I like to photograph looks with a light, natural and well-thought aesthetic. I have a team that helps me in production, from capture to editing. I take care of the details myself and deliver everything ready: high quality images, edited, with attention to light, scenery and style.
philosophy.quote2: I create content with the intention of valuing the pieces and making fashion connect with real life, in a beautiful, commercial and authentic way.
